review: Chromecast is one of the best purchases I've made it a long time.  It's incredible value for the cost.  I previously had a small computer that I used as a media center complete with a wireless keyboard and mouse.  Chromecast removes the need of having this computer while simplifying the process of turning your tv into a media center.

review: I was sorely disappointed with this.  In fact, so disappointed, I purchased the Amazon Fire Stick (something I would have done in the first place, had they been able to access HBO Go at the time of purchse.)  The Chromecast is incredibly difficult to get to work.  It took 2 TVs and 3 electronic devices before we were able to finally cast anything (and we have a household that is up on tech items).  Get the Amazon Fire Stick.  It is a breeze to operate and worth every penny!
